/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with towering buildings, their facades a mix of modern and traditional architectural styles, reflecting the city's rich history and rapid urban development. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a hazy sky, a common sight in densely populated urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
